name: Alpha Dino Sniper 2014 3D FREE: Shoot Spinosaurus, Trex, Raptor
name_original: Alpha Dino Sniper 2014 3D FREE: Shoot Spinosaurus, Trex, Raptor
description:
HUNT or BE HUNTED! - Amazing Dinosaur Sniper Game. With REAL TIME Multiplayer!

How many Dino’s can you snipe in the time limit?

Smaller dinosaurs are worth more points but are harder
to hit. Larger dino’s are bigger but slower so worth
less.

Challenge your friends to get the highest score!

FEATURES:

• Awesome 3D graphics
• Epic slow motion camera
• Real Time Multiplayer!

• Slick FPS controls

- Move by swiping the left of the screen
- Aim by swiping the right
- Tap left button to go into snipe mode
- Tap right button to fire

• Loads of Dino’s to shoot
• Addictive quick gameplay


Download NOW 100% FREE.
